ai_context.purpose: Multi-tenant SupportSignal application for NDIS provider support and comprehensive incident management
ai_context.architecture: Next.js frontend + Convex backend + multi-tenant company isolation + AI-powered analysis
key_patterns: Role-based access control (RBAC) for support organizations
Real-time conversation tracking with LLM access control
ai_context.design_philosophy: Multi-tenant SaaS with comprehensive incident management, AI-powered analysis, and robust data isolation for NDIS support providers

multi_tenancy.purpose: Company-based tenant isolation for multiple NDIS providers

authentication.purpose: BetterAuth-integrated user management with multi-tenant association
key_features: Enhanced role hierarchy for support organizations

incident_management.purpose: Comprehensive incident tracking, narrative collection, and AI-powered analysis

ai_prompts_system.purpose: Centralized AI prompt management with versioning and performance tracking

knowledge_management.purpose: Document ingestion and vector-based knowledge retrieval

conversation_ai.purpose: Conversational AI interface with LLM access control

ai_context.business_meaning: Central tenant entity enabling data isolation for multiple NDIS support providers
ai_context.security_model: Tenant boundary enforcement with status-based access control

incoming.purpose: Reference to users for created_by association

key_fields.name: created_by
key_fields.description: Temporarily optional for seed data - should be required in production

incoming.purpose: Reference to companies for company association

key_fields.name: synced_at
key_fields.description: When this was synced from Redis

key_fields.name: has_llm_access
key_fields.description: Track if message used LLM or fallback

ai_context.business_meaning: Support incidents requiring narrative capture, analysis, and structured response within NDIS provider context
ai_context.security_model: Company-scoped data isolation with workflow-based access control

incoming.purpose: Reference to users for created_by association

key_fields.name: created_by
key_fields.description: Temporarily optional for seed data - should be required in production

ai_context.business_meaning: Multi-phase incident narratives with original user content and AI-enhanced versions
ai_context.security_model: Incident-level access control with narrative versioning

ai_context.business_meaning: AI-generated questions to elicit additional narrative details from users
User responses to AI-generated clarification questions for narrative enhancement

incoming.purpose: Reference to users for answered_by association

key_fields.name: answered_by
key_fields.description: Who provided the answer - temporarily optional

ai_context.business_meaning: AI-powered analysis of incident contributing conditions with user review capability

incoming.purpose: Reference to users for analyzed_by association

key_fields.name: analyzed_by
key_fields.description: Who performed the analysis - temporarily optional

key_fields.name: revision_count
key_fields.description: Number of times analysis was revised

ai_context.business_meaning: Structured categorization and severity assessment of incidents

incoming.purpose: Reference to users for classified_by association

ai_context.business_meaning: Centralized repository of versioned AI prompts with usage analytics
ai_context.security_model: System-wide with version control and usage monitoring

incoming.purpose: Reference to users for created_by association

key_fields.name: workflow_step
key_fields.description: Which workflow step uses this prompt

key_fields.name: is_active
key_fields.description: Whether this version is currently active

key_fields.name: created_by
key_fields.description: Temporarily optional for seed data - should be required in production

key_fields.name: usage_count
key_fields.description: How many times this prompt was used

incident_management.ai_integration: Multi-step analysis pipeline with clarification loops

context_injection.user_context: Authentication state, role, and company association from users table
context_injection.company_context: Multi-tenant boundaries and company-specific data from companies table
context_injection.incident_context: Multi-phase narratives and analysis pipeline state

access_control.company_isolation: All queries scoped by company_id for data isolation
access_control.role_based_permissions: Hierarchical role system with company-boundary enforcement
access_control.feature_gating: has_llm_access flag for AI feature control

workflow_patterns.incident_workflow: Multi-phase capture  AI analysis  human review cycle
workflow_patterns.ai_enhancement: Original content + AI suggestions + user edits pattern
workflow_patterns.prompt_evolution: Versioned prompts with performance tracking and replacement

high_frequency.pattern: Company resolution by slug for multi-tenant routing

medium_frequency.pattern: Active prompt lookup by workflow step
